# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  isffm.cir tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}ISFFM/isffm.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} isffm.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ISFFM/isffm.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}ISFFM/isffm.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP isffm.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}ISFFM/isffm.cir.verify COMMAND ${PERL_BIN} ${XYCE_VERIFY} isffm.cir ${OutputDataDir}/ISFFM/isffm.cir.prn isffm.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}ISFFM/isffm.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED isffm.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ISFFM/isffm.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind")
endif()
